verses.text: “\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* cleanse \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w impurity|strong="H5079"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* erase \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w remove|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w impurity|strong="H2932"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w prophesies|strong="H5012"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* mother \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’ \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophesies|strong="H5012"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* mother \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pierce|strong="H1856"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w through|strong="H1856"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w prophesies|strong="H5012"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* ashamed \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w vision|strong="H2384"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hairy|strong="H8181"\w* cloak \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w deceive|strong="H3584"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* say, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H5030"\w* \w purchased|strong="H7069"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5647"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.’

If someone asks \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H5221"\w* \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5221"\w* chest?’ \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* answer, ‘\w These|strong="H5221"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* received \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* friends.’

\w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w Companion|strong="H7462"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. \w Strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w little|strong="H6819"\w* \w ones|strong="H6819"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, two-thirds \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H1478"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7121"\w* \w through|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w refine|strong="H6884"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w like|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w test|strong="H6884"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w like|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,’ \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.’”
